5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

<window-repaint-event>

Sealed instantiable class

Summary

The class of events involving repainting of a window.

Superclasses

<window-event>

Init-keywords

None.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

The class of events involving repainting of a window.

Operations

None.
